title: Congrates you are toxic
body: Oh seeing one of your teammate died, ping the fuck out of them, trash talking them, not ganking and blaming them lose lane, congrates you are toxic, and i'm pretty sure i met you some point or not, but congrates, i'm not tilted but thank you whoever it is who can make me tilt before, now i'm untiltable, good thing is you are still at bronze, so good luck getting b4.

replies.body: Lmao who even is this at. Bronzies shouldn't even be talking about bad xD
except i'm at plat , the new "bronze'
